name: Detective Mystery
description:
Can you solve a crime when you only have witnesses to go off?

This prototype was done within 2 weeks and has one playable level for the moment. As the detective, you are brought along to a crime scene that has an Officer keeping guard on your 3 witnesses (3 Placeholder Cubes). You are able to move about the home, talking to these witnesses, to understand what has happened. When you know what had happened or what you believe has happened you can leave to give that answer to the Chief.
